title: Looking for a regular duo xD (silver 3 atm)
body: So the person i used to play alot with has stopped playing (cod fanboy) so im looking for someone new to play with i am Currently Silver 3 Finished Silver 5 , I main mid (i play alot of assassins most of them are AD such as talon and zed but i do play ekko quite often too) i prefer to play either top or jungle when i cant get mid i am trash tier at support i can adc but i prefer not to , Skype would be great if possible , I feel i should add i am working on being less of douche in game i get really into the game sometimes XD

replies.body:
Yo,   I'm 19 years old. 
Finished S5 with a Silv1 and Gold 5

I'm keen to find someone a similar age who isn't really loud and serious.  I'm quite calm, I have a really mellow personality and I don't like raging or negativity in communication.   If you can laugh about the misplays and opening admit to fucking up then we'll get along well.  I'm really open to constructive criticism as I see LoL skill as a craft and I enjoy developing my abilities.  

I haven't really mained a lane.  I duo'd my Gold 5 placements with my high plat roomate.  We alternated playing mid/top and won 9/10.  Then I started Uni and never touched that account for months.  My silver has been going since s3 and I played from B4 to S1 in a month, just filled any position.  This was after Uni finished then again quit playing.   I'm a bit irregular with playing the game, i'd go hard for a couple months then focus on shit IRL for a bit.  But I'm keen to knuckle down for S6 as I want platinum by March.

If I find a decent duo partner I want to grow in my consistency with Top and Jungle.
we can play a few and see how it goes if you want , if our personality clash well not much you can do but will never know till we try
